data.title: Compare Citrix Subscriptions: Find the Ideal Solution for Your Business Needs
data.meta_description: Explore the comprehensive Feature Matrix to discover the perfect Citrix subscription for your business. Compare Citrix DaaS, VDI, and app delivery solutions across Universal Hybrid Multi-Cloud, Private Cloud, and more. Understand each plan's benefits to secure and efficiently deliver apps and desktops from any location. Click to learn more about the features and make an informed decision for your IT infrastructure.
data.text:
For additional geographical considerations, please visit our Product Documentation.

To compare Citrix Current Release (CR) and Long Term Service Release (LTSR) editions, please refer to the following matrices:
